item.title: About
item.description: Agonism by Design Pioneering the Future of GPCR Drug Discovery At Virtue Therapeutics, we are at the forefront of revolutionizing the field of computational drug discovery, with a specialized focus on the challenging yet promising G Protein-Coupled Receptors (GPCRs). As the largest human protein family, GPCRs play a pivotal role in numerous diseases, including diabetes, obesity, depression, and sexual dysfunction. About 1/3rd of all approved drugs target GPCRs, highlighting their significance in therapeutics developments.
